# Ejemplo 1. Frecuencuencia acumulada

```{r}
notas = ordered(
  c("S", "A", "N", "Ex", "S", "S", "Ex", "Ex", "N", "A", "A", "A", 
    "A", "N", "S"),
  levels = c("S", "A", "N", "Ex")
)
table(notas)
```

# Ejemplo 2. Frecuencia relativa acumulada

```{r}
set.seed(2018)
clientes = sample(1:5, 50, replace = TRUE)
clientes
```

```{r}
set.seed(NULL)
```

```{r}
table(clientes)
```

```{r}
12/50
11/50
5/50
10/50
```
```{r}
0.24 + 0.24 + 0.22 + 0.1 + 0.2
```
